# RunGame - Free Online Games Platform

> RunGame is a multilingual online gaming platform offering thousands of free browser games in multiple languages. Play instantly without downloads - from action and adventure to puzzles and racing games.

RunGame provides a curated collection of high-quality HTML5 games that work seamlessly on desktop and mobile devices. Our platform supports multiple languages including English and Chinese, making gaming accessible to players worldwide.

## About RunGame

- [Home](https://rungame.online/): Discover featured games and new releases
- [About Us](https://rungame.online/about): Learn about our mission and team
- [How to Play](https://rungame.online/about#how-to-play): Get started with our gaming platform

## Game Categories

- [All Games](https://rungame.online/games): Browse our complete game collection
- [Action Games](https://rungame.online/category/action-games): Fast-paced action and combat games
- [Adventure Games](https://rungame.online/category/adventure-games): Explore immersive adventure worlds
- [Puzzle Games](https://rungame.online/category/puzzle-games): Challenge your mind with brain teasers
- [Racing Games](https://rungame.online/category/racing-games): High-speed racing and driving games
- [Sports Games](https://rungame.online/category/sports-games): Play virtual sports and athletics
- [Strategy Games](https://rungame.online/category/strategy-games): Plan and conquer in strategic gameplay
- [All Categories](https://rungame.online/category): View all game categories

## Popular Collections

- [Most Played Games](https://rungame.online/most-played): Top games by player count
- [New Games](https://rungame.online/new-games): Latest additions to our platform
- [Hot Games](https://rungame.online/hot-games): Trending games right now
- [Featured Games](https://rungame.online/): Handpicked quality games

- [All Tags](https://rungame.online/tag): Explore games by features and characteristics
- [Multiplayer Games](https://rungame.online/tag/multiplayer): Play with friends online
- [Single Player Games](https://rungame.online/tag/single-player): Solo gaming experiences
- [3D Games](https://rungame.online/tag/3d): Immersive 3D graphics
- [Mobile Games](https://rungame.online/tag/mobile): Optimized for mobile devices

- [English Version](https://rungame.online/): Full site in English

## Important Pages

- [Privacy Policy](https://rungame.online/privacy): How we protect your privacy
- [Terms of Service](https://rungame.online/terms): Usage terms and conditions
- [Contact Us](https://rungame.online/contact): Get in touch with our team

## Site Features

- **Free to Play**: All games are completely free, no downloads required
- **Instant Access**: Play directly in your browser on any device
- **Multilingual**: Full support for multiple languages
- **Mobile Friendly**: Optimized for both desktop and mobile gaming
- **Regular Updates**: New games added frequently
- **Safe & Secure**: Family-friendly content, safe browsing

## Technical Information

- [Sitemap](https://rungame.online/sitemap.xml): Complete site structure for search engines
- [Robots.txt](https://rungame.online/robots.txt): Search engine crawling guidelines
- [RSS Feed](https://rungame.online/rss): Subscribe to new game updates
